mapper.select: select e.program_id,e.program_name, e.program_type, e.program_code,e.service_object, e.admin_dept, e.report_date, e.latest_update_date, e.legal_time_limit, e.promise_time_limit, e.is_online_open, e.apply_url, e.ask_url, e.result_query_url, e.process_query_url, e.base_code, e.impl_code, e.category_id, e.version, e.can_self_terminal_apply from PY_BASE.appr_program_def e,PY_BASE.lzcity_approve_unit_info i where i.unit_code = e.competent_dept and e.program_id = #{programId}

select m.program_id, m.material_id,m.material_class, m.is_trust, m.material_name,m.norm_code, m.mate_sort,m.material_remark, m.access_standard, m.blank_url,m.template_url, m.blank_type, m.template_type from PY_BASE.APPR_PROGRAM_MATERIAL m where m.program_id = #{programId}

select k.win_name,k.tel, k.address, k.worktime, k.traffic_guide, k.win_id from PY_BASE.APPR_PROGRAM_WINDOW k, PY_BASE.APPR_PROGRAM_WINDOW_RELATE r where k.win_id = r.win_id and r.program_id = #{programId}

select a.seq ,a.review_org_addr,a.review_org_phone,a.advise_web, a.blog_web, a.wechat_num, a.email, a.ask_type from PY_BASE.APPR_PROGRAM_ITEM_ASK a ,PY_BASE.APPR_PROGRAM_ITEM_ASK_RELATED r where a.seq = r.seq and r.program_id = #{programId}
